author: Simon Difford
description: A ridiculously simple party drink with three equal parts shaken to produce a pineapple and coconut cocktail fortified with rum and crowned with a foamy head. Off dry and fruity rather than sweet.
name: Koko Colada
recipeIngredient: 37.5 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
